divs: Sighting DetailsAfter all others of camping slept away, 2 Discs, bright white hoverd with no noise above me between the trees over the lake. one seem nearer other farer cause one was huge but both same whote disc shape from under them and they flew in formation. Hole event lasted for me only a few moments not more than 30 seconds, they few very slow, slower than every plane at the evening whitch was then mutch more far away, the 2 discs where bright white, no pulsing, no colorchange.
